text: Aur jo tujh say (saza ki talbi mein) jaldi ker rahey hain rahat say pehlay hi yaqeenan inn say pehlay sazayen (bator misal) guzar chuki hain aur be-shak tera rab albata bakhshney wala hai logon kay bey jaa zulm per bhi. Aur yeh bhi yaqeeni baat hai kay tera rab bari sakht saza deney wala bhi hai
